text:
I used to buy into all the productivity lore

learned the hard way—it's about managing energy, not just time

didn't want to make this but I've been thinking about it for over a year(!) now 

no better time+place to try it than @_nightsweekends cc:@_buildspace https://t.co/T6qCMldipU

user_info.name: Ashni
user_info.description:
read, write and code a bit better each day ✨
